name: Kiwi Evolution - Idle Tycoon & Clicker Game
name_original: Kiwi Evolution - Idle Tycoon & Clicker Game
description:
Kiwi Evolution - Idle Tycoon & Clicker Game is a casual game developed by Evolution Games.
Kiwi Evolution - Idle Tycoon & Clicker Game is available on Android. You can purchase the game on Google Play.
